item.text: Triggers a special effect when Killing an Enemy.
Recover 185 Shield Energy in 5 seconds when Killing an Enemy.
Recover 310 Shield Energy in 5 seconds when Killing an Enemy.
Recover 455 Shield Energy in 5 seconds when Killing an Enemy.
Recover 610 Shield Energy in 5 seconds when Killing an Enemy.
Recover 780 Shield Energy in 5 seconds when Killing an Enemy.
Triggers a special effect when your HP is more than 80%.
Your Attack is increased by 10 when your HP is more than 80%.
Your Attack is increased by 17 when your HP is more than 80%.
Your Attack is increased by 24 when your HP is more than 80%.
Your Attack is increased by 33 when your HP is more than 80%.
Your Attack is increased by 42 when your HP is more than 80%.
Triggers a special effect when causing a Critical Hit.
Increase your Charge Energy by 1 when causing Critical Hit to your Enemy.
Increase your Charge Energy by 2 when causing Critical Hit to your Enemy.
Increase your Charge Energy by 3 when causing Critical Hit to your Enemy.
Increase your Charge Energy by 4 when causing Critical Hit to your Enemy.
Increase your Charge Energy by 5 when causing Critical Hit to your Enemy.
Triggers a special effect when hitting an Enemy.
Decrease your target's Attack by 40% for 5 seconds when hitting him. This effect triggers once per 10 seconds.
Decrease your target's Attack by 40% for 5 seconds when hitting him. This effect triggers once per 9.5 seconds.
Decrease your target's Attack by 40% for 5 seconds when hitting him. This effect triggers once per 9 seconds.
Decrease your target's Attack by 40% for 5 seconds when hitting him. This effect triggers once per 8.5 seconds.
Decrease your target's Attack by 40% for 5 seconds when hitting him. This effect triggers once per 8 seconds.
Triggers a special effect when hitting an Enemy within 12 meters.
Reduce your target's Move Speed by 30% for 3 seconds when hitting an Enemy within 12 meters.
Reduce your target's Move Speed by 30% for 3.5 seconds when hitting an Enemy within 12 meters.
Reduce your target's Move Speed by 30% for 4 seconds when hitting an Enemy within 12 meters.
Reduce your target's Move Speed by 30% for 4.5 seconds when hitting an Enemy within 12 meters.
Reduce your target's Move Speed by 30% for 5 seconds when hitting an Enemy within 12 meters.
Triggers a special effect when hitting an Enemy's Energy Shield.
Decrease your target's Energy Shield by 60 when hitting his Energy Shield.
Decrease your target's Energy Shield by 136 when hitting his Energy Shield.
Decrease your target's Energy Shield by 199 when hitting his Energy Shield.
Decrease your target's Energy Shield by 268 when hitting his Energy Shield.
Decrease your target's Energy Shield by 345 when hitting his Energy Shield.
Triggers a special effect when Killing an Enemy.
Reduce your Mine skill Cooldown by 3 seconds when killing an Enemy. Increase the max amount of Mines you can deploy by 1.
Reduce your Mine skill Cooldown by 5 seconds when killing an Enemy. Increase the max amount of Mines you can deploy by 1.
Reduce your Mine skill Cooldown by 6 seconds when killing an Enemy. Increase the max amount of Mines you can deploy by 1.
Reduce your Mine skill Cooldown by 6.5 seconds when killing an Enemy. Increase the max amount of Mines you can deploy by 1.
Reduce your Mine skill Cooldown by 7 seconds when killing an Enemy. Increase the max amount of Mines you can deploy by 1.
Triggers a special effect when hitting a Summoned device.
Gain 5 extra Attack for 3 seconds when hitting a Summoned device.
Gain 13 extra Attack for 3 seconds when hitting a Summoned device.
Gain 19 extra Attack for 3 seconds when hitting a Summoned device.
Gain 26 extra Attack for 3 seconds when hitting a Summoned device.
Gain 33 extra Attack for 3 seconds when hitting a Summoned device.
Triggers a special effect when hitting an Enemy.
Extend your Turret's Duration by 3 seconds and recover its HP by 87 when hitting an Enemy.
Extend your Turret's Duration by 3.5 seconds and recover its HP by 197 when hitting an Enemy.
Extend your Turret's Duration by 4 seconds and recover its HP by 286 when hitting an Enemy.
Extend your Turret's Duration by 4.5 seconds and recover its HP by 384 when hitting an Enemy.
Extend your Turret's Duration by 5 seconds and recover its HP by 491 when hitting an Enemy.
Triggers a special effect when hitting an Enemy with Energy Shield.
When hitting an Enemy with Energy Shield, your Turret's Attack is increased by 52 for 4 seconds. And this Enemy will have higher priority as your Turret's target.
When hitting an Enemy with Energy Shield, your Turret's Attack is increased by 117 for 4 seconds. And this Enemy will have higher priority as your Turret's target.
When hitting an Enemy with Energy Shield, your Turret's Attack is increased by 170 for 4 seconds. And this Enemy will have higher priority as your Turret's target.
When hitting an Enemy with Energy Shield, your Turret's Attack is increased by 229 for 4 seconds. And this Enemy will have higher priority as your Turret's target.
When hitting an Enemy with Energy Shield, your Turret's Attack is increased by 292 for 4 seconds. And this Enemy will have higher priority as your Turret's target.
Triggers a special effect when hitting Enemy within 30 meters.
Reduce your target's Hit Rate by 50% for 3 seconds when hitting him from more than 30 meters.
Reduce your target's Hit Rate by 50% for 3.5 seconds when hitting him from more than 30 meters.
Reduce your target's Hit Rate by 50% for 4 seconds when hitting him from more than 30 meters.
Reduce your target's Hit Rate by 50% for 4.5 seconds when hitting him from more than 30 meters.
Reduce your target's Hit Rate by 50% for 5 seconds when hitting him from more than 30 meters.
Triggers a special effect when hitting an Enemy.
Reduce the target's Defence by 14 for 2 seconds when hitting him.
Reduce the target's Defence by 27 for 2 seconds when hitting him.
Reduce the target's Defence by 34 for 2 seconds when hitting him.
Reduce the target's Defence by 50 for 2 seconds when hitting him.
Reduce the target's Defence by 60 for 2 seconds when hitting him.
Triggers a special effect when causing Headshot to your Enemy.
Recover 1 ammo to your Magazine when Headshot your target. This effect can be triggered once per 5 seconds.
Recover 1 ammo to your Magazine when Headshot your target. This effect can be triggered once per 4 seconds.
Recover 1 ammo to your Magazine when Headshot your target. This effect can be triggered once per 3 seconds.
Recover 2 ammo to your Magazine when Headshot your target. This effect can be triggered once per 5 seconds.
Recover 2 ammo to your Magazine when Headshot your target. This effect can be triggered once per 4 seconds.
Triggers a special effect when hitting an Enemy with Energy Shield.
Cause 49 Damage per second for 2 seconds to your target when hitting him with Energy Shield. This effect won't kill your target.
Cause 110 Damage per second for 2 seconds to your target when hitting him with Energy Shield. This effect won't kill your target.
Cause 161 Damage per second for 2 seconds to your target when hitting him with Energy Shield. This effect won't kill your target.
Cause 217 Damage per second for 2 seconds to your target when hitting him with Energy Shield. This effect won't kill your target.
Cause 279 Damage per second for 2 seconds to your target when hitting him with Energy Shield. This effect won't kill your target.
Triggers a special effect when hitting an Enemy and your Energy Shield is full.
Prevent your target from recovering Energy Shield for 2 seconds when hitting him and your Energy Shield is full.
Prevent your target from recovering Energy Shield for 2.5 seconds when hitting him and your Energy Shield is full.
Prevent your target from recovering Energy Shield for 3 seconds when hitting him and your Energy Shield is full.
Prevent your target from recovering Energy Shield for 3.5 seconds when hitting him and your Energy Shield is full.
Prevent your target from recovering Energy Shield for 4 seconds when hitting him and your Energy Shield is full.
Triggers a special effect when hitting an Enemy beyond 35 meters.
Create an Explosion causing 87 Damage to all Enemies within 6 meters on your target when hitting him beyond 35 meters.
Create an Explosion causing 195 Damage to all Enemies within 6 meters on your target when hitting him beyond 35 meters.
Create an Explosion causing 284 Damage to all Enemies within 6 meters on your target when hitting him beyond 35 meters.
Create an Explosion causing 381 Damage to all Enemies within 6 meters on your target when hitting him beyond 35 meters.
Create an Explosion causing 487 Damage to all Enemies within 6 meters on your target when hitting him beyond 35 meters.
Triggers a special effect when hitting an Enemy within 12 meters.
Reduce your target's Move Speed by 80% for 1 seconds when hitting him within 12 meters.
Reduce your target's Move Speed by 80% for 1.4 seconds when hitting him within 12 meters.
Reduce your target's Move Speed by 80% for 1.8 seconds when hitting him within 12 meters.
Reduce your target's Move Speed by 80% for 2.2 seconds when hitting him within 12 meters.
Reduce your target's Move Speed by 80% for 2.5 seconds when hitting him within 12 meters.
Triggers a special effect when causing Headshot to your Enemy.
Recover 47 Energy Shield when causing Headshot to your Enemy.
Recover 80 Energy Shield when causing Headshot to your Enemy.
Recover 116 Energy Shield when causing Headshot to your Enemy.
Recover 155 Energy Shield when causing Headshot to your Enemy.
Recover 199 Energy Shield when causing Headshot to your Enemy.
Triggers a special effect when Reload.
Recover 300 HP of your Riot Shield when Reload.
Recover 680 HP of your Riot Shield when Reload.
Recover 1000 HP of your Riot Shield when Reload.
Recover 1350 HP of your Riot Shield when Reload.
Recover 1700 HP of your Riot Shield when Reload.
Triggers a special effect when hitting an Enemy within 12 meters.
Drop an Recharger which recovers 110 Energy Shield's HP near you when Hitting an Enemy within 12 meters..
Drop an Recharger which recovers 187 Energy Shield's HP near you when Hitting an Enemy within 12 meters..
Drop an Recharger which recovers 272 Energy Shield's HP near you when Hitting an Enemy within 12 meters..
Drop an Recharger which recovers 366 Energy Shield's HP near you when Hitting an Enemy within 12 meters..
Drop an Recharger which recovers 467 Energy Shield's HP near you when Hitting an Enemy within 12 meters..
Triggers a special effect when causing a Critical Hit.
Reduce the Cooldown time of your Biotic Emitter by 0.5 seconds when causing a Critical Hit, this effect can be triggered every 4 seconds.
Reduce the Cooldown time of your Biotic Emitter by 0.5 seconds when causing a Critical Hit, this effect can be triggered every 3.5 seconds.
Reduce the Cooldown time of your Biotic Emitter by 0.5 seconds when causing a Critical Hit, this effect can be triggered every 3 seconds.
Reduce the Cooldown time of your Biotic Emitter by 0.5 seconds when causing a Critical Hit, this effect can be triggered every 2.5 seconds.
Reduce the Cooldown time of your Biotic Emitter by 0.5 seconds when causing a Critical Hit, this effect can be triggered every 2 seconds.
Triggers a special effect when Hitting an Enemy.
When hitting an Enemy, reduce your his HP by 4 and recover your HP by the same amount. This effect won't kill your Enemy.
When hitting an Enemy, reduce your his HP by 9 and recover your HP by the same amount. This effect won't kill your Enemy.
When hitting an Enemy, reduce your his HP by 13 and recover your HP by the same amount. This effect won't kill your Enemy.
When hitting an Enemy, reduce your his HP by 17 and recover your HP by the same amount. This effect won't kill your Enemy.
When hitting an Enemy, reduce your his HP by 22 and recover your HP by the same amount. This effect won't kill your Enemy.
Triggers a special effect when Killing an Enemy.
Drop an Ammo Supply which recovers 30% of your max ammo Amount near you when Killing an Enemy. This effect can be triggered once every 8 seconds.
Drop an Ammo Supply which recovers 30% of your max ammo Amount near you when Killing an Enemy. This effect can be triggered once every 7 seconds.
Drop an Ammo Supply which recovers 30% of your max ammo Amount near you when Killing an Enemy. This effect can be triggered once every 6 seconds.

Triggers a special effect when hitting an Enemy within 12 meters.
Reduce your target's Skill Energy Charge by 20% when hitting him within 12 meters.
Reduce your target's Skill Energy Charge by 25% when hitting him within 12 meters.
Reduce your target's Skill Energy Charge by 30% when hitting him within 12 meters.
Reduce your target's Skill Energy Charge by 35% when hitting him within 12 meters.
Reduce your target's Skill Energy Charge by 40% when hitting him within 12 meters.

Throw a Grenade to targeted location, it will explode upon hitting anything, and deals Explosive Damage to all Enemies within 4 meters. The nearer to the explosion center, the more damage those victims will suffer. The explosion will cause Percentage damage based on target's (max Hp + max Energy Shield), and a fixed damage.

Throw a Grenade to targeted location, it will explode upon hitting anything, and deals Explosive Damage to all Enemies within 6 meters. The nearer to the explosion center, the more damage those victims will suffer. The explosion will cause Percentage damage based on target's (max Hp + max Energy Shield), and a fixed damage.

item.description: 主动技能升级所需材料

item.text: Enable Tactical Visor, increasing your Critical Damage and mark enemies' head in a short time. The total Critical Damage increased is based on a percentage of your base Critical Damage and plus a fixed amount of Critical Damage.

Enable Tactical Visor, increasing your Critical Damage and mark enemies' head in a short time. The total Critical Damage increased is based on a percentage of your base Critical Damage and plus a fixed amount of Critical Damage.

Enable Tactical Visor, increasing your Critical Damage, Hit Rate and mark enemies' head in a short time. The total Critical Damage increased is based on a percentage of your base Critical Damage and plus a fixed amount of Critical Damage. The Hit Rate increase is based on a percentage of your base Hit Rate.

item.description: 战术目镜品质提升时的相关说明描述，品质2
item.text: The quality of Tactical Visor will be evolved.\nTactical Visor will also increase your Hit Rate.

Plant a Seeker Bomb which goes to the destination automatically, it seeks Enemy around it on its way to the destination. The Seeker Bomb explodes when it's close enough to Enemy, causing Explode damage to all Enemies within 4 meters, and reduce their Move Speed for a while. The explosion will cause Percentage damage based on target's (max Hp + max Energy Shield), and a fixed damage.

Plant a Seeker Bomb which goes to the destination automatically, it seeks Enemy around it on its way to the destination. The Seeker Bomb explodes when it's close enough to Enemy, causing Explode damage to all Enemies within 4 meters, and reduce their Move Speed for a while. The explosion will cause Percentage damage based on target's (max Hp + max Energy Shield), and a fixed damage.

Plant a Seeker Bomb which goes to the destination automatically, it seeks Enemy around it on its way to the destination. The Seeker Bomb explodes when it's close enough to Enemy, causing Explode damage to all Enemies within 4 meters, and reduce their Move Speed and Hit Rate for a while. The explosion will cause Percentage damage based on target's (max Hp + max Energy Shield), and a fixed damage.

Plant a Mine which explodes automatically when Enemies come nearby, causing Explode damage to all Enemies within 3 meters. The nearer to the explosion center, the more damage those victims will suffer. The explosion will cause Percentage damage based on target's (max Hp + max Energy Shield), and a fixed damage.

The nearer to the explosion center, the more damage those victims will suffer. The explosion will cause Percentage damage based on target's (max Hp + max Energy Shield), and a fixed damage.

Deploy a Turret that Attacks all Enemies within its range. The Attack of the Turret equals your hero's Primary weapon's Attack multiply a percentage figure and plus a fixed number of Attack. The HP of your Turret equals your hero's (HP+Shield) multiply a percentage figure.
